channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nation on edge: Experts warn of “vicious spiral" in political violence after Kirk killing
Husband Switches Seats with Wife on Tourist Attraction, Then Dies in Crash. She Didn’t Know What Happened for Days
‘Who Exactly Are You Protecting?’ Raskin Presses FBI On Epstein Files
Winning numbers drawn in Wednesday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Wednesday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 02-24-45-53-64, Powerball: 5

item.title: Longtime head of Mexican megachurch is indicted in New York on federal sex trafficking charges
item.description: A New York federal indictment has charged the longtime head of a Mexican megachurch with racketeering conspiracy and sex trafficking

item.title: Wife of ex-Sen. Bob Menendez set to be sentenced for role in bribery scheme
item.description: The wife of former U.S. Sen. Bob Menendez is set to be sentenced for her role in a bribery scheme that sent the once-influential Democrat to prison

item.title: Democratic senator warns colleagues of 'distorted system' if college sports bill passes
item.description: Sen. Maria Cantwell has warned that a bill regulating college sports could widen the gap between major athletic conferences and others

item.title: Trial starts for a man accused of attempting to assassinate Trump
item.description: Opening statements are set to begin for the trial of a man charged with trying to assassinate Donald Trump while he played golf in South Florida last ...

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel Reacts To Charlie Kirk’s Shooting Death: “Instead Of Angry Finger-Pointing, Can We Just For One Day Agree That It Is Horrible And Monstrous To Shoot Another Human?”
Democratic senator warns colleagues of 'distorted system' if college sports bill passes
